author: Jerrold G.
comment: It doesn't hold subdial settings after saving them. It always reverts back to default settings even though settings show otherwise.  (ZTE Quartz Wear 2.0)

reply.author: Ang Corp
reply.content:
Hi Jerrold,

I am sorry to hear of your issue. I have released an update - can you please check if the issue is resolved?
If not, please send me an E-Mail to angcorp.dev@gmail.com to do further troubleshooting.

Thank you!

author: William Johnson
comment: While it seems to work as expected on AW1.0  one on AW2.0 on the Urbane the day name is off by one (e.g., says Monday on Tuesday)  and as near as I can tell it cannot be fixed.

reply.author: Ang Corp
reply.content:
Hi William,

I am sorry to hear about the issue you have.
Unfortunately I am unable to reproduce it.
What settings do you use on your AW2.0 watch - does it sync the time and date from the phone or manually?
Can you please send me an E-Mail to angcorp.dev@gmail.com so I can help further?

Thanks in advance!

author: Mike Davis
comment: Everything how you like it. That's exactly how I like it!
title: Great options!

author: Mike Chimitt
comment: I have tried others, but always come back to Qualiss.  Two requests, I wish there was a different icon other than shoes for step counter, and larger numbers in battery icons.  This is the best watchface, worth the money!  Thanks!
title: Always come back to it!

author: Orlin Nedkov
comment: It is pretty good. However the customization options are not enough.  I would like more colors options. Two examples:   1. The end of the face near the frame where the hours are presented is always white. That looks fine only with white or black color of the watch.  2. (Currently) It is not possible to change the color of the hands only.

reply.author: Ang Corp
reply.content:
Thank you Orlin for the feedback.
Definitely good suggestions - I'll work to implement them in the upcoming update :)

author: Jeff Isaac
comment: I like the looks of this watch face, but it crashes quite often with the message that it has unexpectedly quit. It also seems to be resource intensive.

reply.author: Ang Corp
reply.content:
Hi Jeff,

I have released a new update for Qualiss Watch Face.
Could you please update and check if the watch is working properly for you now?
If not, please contact me on angcorp.dev@gmail.com with more information.

Thank you very much in advance!

title: Buggy...

author: Shawn Painter
comment: How often does the weather update? It seems I have to refresh manually to see a change.

reply.author: Ang Corp
reply.content:
Hi Shawn,

Thank you for your feedback!
The weather updates every 60min. If you refresh it manually this counter gets reset and the next update is after another 60min.
I am however working on an update where I'll give the possibility to change this interval - like 15 min or so. I can give you more details if you write me to angcorp.dev@gmail.com

author: Brian Sayatovic
comment: I love being able to see so much on the face and, with one tap, access even more.  Also note that the standby face is very clear and easy to read - something many watch faces fail at. Lastly, the developer is engaged! I had an earlier comment wishing that airplane mode could be toggled and I received a quick explanation that it was an android 4.2+ limitation.

reply.author: Ang Corp
reply.content:
Hi Brian,

Thank you very much for your words and support!
Unfortunately it is impossible to have toggle airplane mode. After Android 4.2 this setting can be controlled only by system apps. I'm sorry for the inconvenience.

title: Tons of functionality a tap or two away

author: Jason Wilkins
comment: Nice watch face! Unfortunately the weather reading is incorrect! Just paid too! Please fix!

reply.author: Ang Corp
reply.content:
Hi Jason,

Thank you very much for your feedback!
Would you kindly let me know on angcorp.dev@gmail.com more about the issue with the weather - what is the difference and comparing to what source? I'll be more than happy to look into it.

Thanks!

title: Nice!

author: Dale Klingbeil
comment: Temp on weather says it's -473.1f????

reply.author: Ang Corp
reply.content:
Hi Dale,

Thank you for your feedback! Generally this should not happen - did you just downloaded the app from Play Store?
Can you please try to go to settings and touch "Refresh Weather"?
Please let me know on angcorp.dev@gmail.com if the issue still persist and I'll do my best to solve it!

Thank you :)

comment: Excellent one

title: Excellent

comment: Nice face great customisation... would be great to be able to interact with the date to bring up calendar, and another inactive dial to the right or a interactive spot here would give more options. Thanks for allowing any app, like timer instead of stop watch in popup draw. Cheers

reply.author: Ang Corp
reply.content:
Hi Simon,

more interactivity is certainly coming in the next updates. Thanks for the suggestions - I'll see how to implement them in the next updates! :)

now you can assign any app to the shortcuts. Can you please check if it works for you? :)

title: Great work

author: Chun-wing Steven Si
comment: Can you please enable us to lengthen the duration of the activation time? Much appreciated for a small favour. Its way too short at the moment. Otherwise perfect on my sw3. Updated version works perfectly.

reply.author: Ang Corp
reply.content:
Hi and thank you for your feedback!
The feature is coming soon in the next update. Stay tuned :)

there is new update with screen off timeout. Can you check and see if the feature works for you? :)

title: Sweet watchface

author: John Ferrara
comment: This is ,by far,  my favorite watch face. The customization is great . I like the fact that you can change the colors of the hour markers and the background. Hope you make more classic watch faces! I will deffinetly be on the look out for more designs by you. One request is if you can offer more hand and minute hand styles...if not it is still, IMO, the best out on the market.

reply.author: Ang Corp
reply.content:
Thank you John!
It feels awesome to hear such words! I'll do my best to add more content.

title: Fantastic!!!

author: Joseph Hutchinson
comment: This is a great looking watch face with a great ambient mode and customizations. Has decent interactive behaviour compared to other faces, which I'm actually finding useful!

reply.author: Ang Corp
reply.content: Thank you very much Joseph!

title: Best I've used

author: Tracey Tonks
comment: Lovin this watch, there's so many options to choose from without it being confusing, keep up the good work

reply.author: Ang Corp
reply.content:
Hi Tracey,

Thank you! I'm happy you like Qualiss Watch:)
To change th colors, go to your Android Wear app and click on the settings icon overlaying Qualiss Watch preview. When the app opens you click on "Change the color of the watch" and adjust it:)

If you have further questions contact me on angcorp.dev@gmail.com and I'll assist!

Thank you!

reply.author: Ang Corp
reply.content:
Hi Scott,

Thank you for your feedback!

On the weather - currently OpenWeatherMap is used, but I'll add another one soon.
Thanks!

author: David Wing
comment: Very nice watch face, love being able to customise it and interactive hotspots. Keep up the great work. Can't wait to see what the new updates bring. And excellent customer service.

reply.author: Ang Corp

title: Terrific Work

author: Jim Dantin
comment: Doesn't clutter up the watch face with too much info. The detailed weather forecast is just a tap away.

reply.author: Ang Corp
reply.content: Thank you very much Jim!

title: Perfect balance of features

author: David Ray
comment: has a lot of customizable features one in particular I've been trying to find which this one offers at a high level is linking to the agenda I would like to see it not always display a zero for my agenda I would like to see maybe account of events and the dial that used for the agenda would be amazing to see actual time bars for when I have events I would actually really love to see you a whole watch face dedicated to agenda integration
title: Pretty nice, one wish

author: Mayank Singla
comment: The watch face it's pretty great. A thoughts for improvement - asking for different color of smaller dials and some options for hands would be great. Also seems like choosing he second time zone as IST gives wrong time.. Same with Asia/Kolkata.. It gives a half an hour wrong time.. Should fix that too.

reply.author: Ang Corp
reply.content:
Hi Mayank,

Can you please check the time issue if it is resolved?
I'm still working on your other suggestion.

Thank you!

title: Pretty good

author: Lambros Katsaros
comment: Dears, the design of the watch is pretty good. Unfortunately I have a problem with the steps count. It isn't refreshed while I am walking. I must tip on the clock steps area and after changing to all other options like weather, digital clock etc. it comes back to the steps counter with the updated values. Is there a way to view my current steps status without the above workaround?

reply.author: Ang Corp
reply.content:
Hi Lambros,

Thank you for your feedback!
I think I know what is your issue and what is causing it. Would you be so kind to send me an E-Mail to angcorp.dev@gmail.com
I want to ask you few things so I can understand better the situation and fix it.

Thank you!

title: Steps are not being refreshed
